name: sui-dev-agents
description: Complete SUI blockchain development toolkit with skills and agents for Move smart contracts, frontend integration, testing, and deployment
longDescription: SUI Dev Agents provides a comprehensive toolkit for building production-ready SUI blockchain applications. Includes 19 user-invocable skills and 23 orchestration agents covering the complete development lifecycle: on-chain contract analysis, architecture planning, Move smart contract development, frontend integration, comprehensive testing with coverage analysis, multi-network deployment, and ecosystem integrations (Kiosk, zkLogin, DeepBook, Walrus, SuiNS, etc.).
features: Move smart contract development with quality checks
On-chain contract decompilation and source analysis
Comprehensive testing (unit, integration, E2E, gas benchmarks, coverage analysis)
Ecosystem integrations (Kiosk, zkLogin, DeepBook, Walrus, SuiNS)
TypeScript SDK type generation from Move
